00061 class lbann_summary {
00062 public:
00063 
00069   lbann_summary(std::string logdir, lbann_comm* comm);
00070   ~lbann_summary();
00071 
00073   void reduce_mean(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step);
00075   void reduce_min(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step);
00077   void reduce_max(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step);
00079   void reduce_stdev(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step);
00081   void reduce_scalar(const std::string tag, DataType s, int64_t step);
00083   void sum_reduce_scalar(const std::string tag, DataType s, int64_t step);
00085   void reduce_histogram(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step);
00086 
00092   void flush();
00093 
00094 private:
00095   lbann_comm* comm;
00096   TBinf::SummaryWriter* sw;
00097 
00099   struct pending_op {
00100     pending_op(const std::string tag, int64_t step, DataType local,
00101                DataType local2 = 0.0f, int num = 0) :
00102       tag(tag), step(step), local(local), local2(local2), num(num) {}
00104     const std::string tag;
00106     int64_t step;
00108     DataType local;
00110     DataType local2;
00112     int num;
00113   };
00114 
00116   std::vector<pending_op> pending_means;
00118   std::vector<pending_op> pending_mins;
00120   std::vector<pending_op> pending_maxes;
00122   std::vector<pending_op> pending_stdevs;
00124   std::vector<pending_op> pending_scalars;
00126   std::vector<pending_op> pending_sum_scalars;
00127 
00129   void flush_means();
00131   void flush_mins();
00133   void flush_maxes();
00135   void flush_stdevs();
00137   void flush_scalars();
00139   void flush_sum_scalars();
00140 
00142   DataType local_sum(const Mat& mat) const;
00144   DataType local_sqsum(const Mat& mat) const;
00146   std::string prepend_model(const std::string tag, int model) const;
00148   void gather_scalar_summary(const std::string tag, DataType s, int64_t step);
00150   void gather_scalar_summary(const std::vector<pending_op>& ops,
00151                              std::vector<DataType>& scalars);
00152 };

00157 class lbann_summary {
00158 public:
00159   lbann_summary(std::string logdir, lbann_comm* comm) {}
00160 
00161   void reduce_mean(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step) {}
00162   void reduce_min(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step) {}
00163   void reduce_max(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step) {}
00164   void reduce_stdev(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step) {}
00165   void reduce_scalar(const std::string tag, DataType s, int64_t step) {}
00166   void sum_reduce_scalar(const std::string tag, DataType s, int64_t step) {}
00167   void reduce_histogram(const std::string tag, const ElMat& mat, int64_t step) {}
00168   void flush() {}
00169 };
